page.title: 10SUNDERLAND AIRCRAFT MUSEUM
page.content: Situated next to its former site on the airfield, the museum was started by enthusiasts from Sunderland Flying Club. With money raised, donations and help from local firms, old aircraft were bought and others donated. Renovation work is carried out by members in their spare time. The museum is run as a non-profit making organization, charging a minimal entry fee. To-day it houses a number of jet aircraft, helicopters and vehicles with a Vulcan bomber the centre piece of the display.
